bug.author: ananthsub
bug.summary: cloud_io's `load` should use fsspec for compatibility with more storage systems
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
There's an inconsistency in which paths Lightning supports with load vs what fsspec can support:
pytorch-lightning/pytorch_lightning/utilities/cloud_io.py
Line 27 in b4256df
def load(path_or_url: str, map_location=None):
This code should use to try to open the file. If there isn't a valid filesystem registered, then fallback to calling torch.hub.load. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awaelchli>@awaelchli</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Pass a URL supported by fsspec but not torch.load(...) and try calling cloud_io's load with it
